pages.text: Your best bet to get started is to make yourself the following: $(li)Industrial Hemp$() $(li)Engineer's Manual$() $(li)Engineer's Hammer$() $(li)A Coke Oven$() $(li)A Blast Furnace$() The hemp is used to make the Engineer's Hammer, the manual explains IE in full, and the hammer is used to construct the Coke Oven and Blast Furnace.
Once you make one in a Create Mechanical Crafter, you can repair your broken down one with these materials above.
